price: ߞߵߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒ߬ߠߎ߫ ߖߘߐ߬ߣߍ߲߬ߓߊ ߟߋ߫ ߕߘߍ߬ ߒ߬ ߞߐߙߍ ߟߎ߬ ߕߍߡߊ߬
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبۡلُ فِيٓ أَهۡلِنَا مُشۡفِقِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qālū innā kunnā qablu fī ahlinā mush'fiqīna
